程序包 designPattern

类 RectangleTapisVisitor

java.lang.Object
designPattern.RectangleTapisVisitor
所有已实现的接口:
Visitor
public class RectangleTapisVisitor
extends java.lang.Object
implements Visitor
A class representing the rectangular chessboard in the game Shape up. This class implements Visitor.

Class RectangleTapisVisitor mainly contains the following functions: calculate the score, judge whether the placed card position is legal, judge whether it meets the adjacency rules, and visit each game mode,etc. For exemple: 

     RectangleTapisVisitor tapis = new RectangleTapisVisitor();
     tapis.calculerScore(joueur);
从以下版本开始:
13 January 2021
版本:
%I%
作者:
WU Zhongyang, GUAN Mingjun

  • 构造器详细资料

    • RectangleTapisVisitor

      public RectangleTapisVisitor()
      This is the constructor of the class RectangleTapisVisitor.

      This method initializes a 12*12 chessboard, where the ArrayList contains ArrayList, and initializes each element to null.

  • 方法详细资料

    • newCo

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Carte>> newCo()
      This method creates a new chessboard and initializes the chessboard to null.
      返回:
      Newly created chessboard

    • getTapis

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Carte>> getTapis()
      This method gets the chessboard of the object.
      返回:
      The chessboard to get

    • clear

      public void clear()
      This method removes all of the cards from this ArrayList. The list will be empty after this call returns.
      另请参阅:
      ArrayList.clear()

    • ajouterCarte

      public void ajouterCarte​(int x, int y, Carte c)
      This method places the specified card on the specified position on the board.
      参数:
      x - The abscissa of the specified position on the chessboard
      y - The ordinate of the specified position of the chessboard
      c - Card to be placed
      另请参阅:
      ArrayList.get(int), ArrayList.set(int, Object)

    • hasCarte

      public boolean hasCarte​(int x, int y)
      This method determines whether there is a card at the specified position on the board.
      参数:
      x - The abscissa of the location to be judged
      y - The ordinate of the location to be judged
      返回:
      If there is a card in that position, return true, else false

    • isAdjacent

      public boolean isAdjacent​(int x, int y)
      This method determines whether the position of the card to be placed meets the adjacent rules.

      If there are no cards on the board, the adjacent rules are met. If there are cards on the board, judge whether the position of the card to be placed is up, down, left, and right of the existing cards.

      参数:
      x - The abscissa of the card to be placed
      y - The ordinate of the card to be placed
      返回:
      If the adjacency rules are met, then return true, else false

    • isLegalPlay

      public boolean isLegalPlay​(int x, int y)
      This method determines whether the position of the card to be placed is legal or not.

      The method first determines the length and width of the current chessboard.

      Under the premise that the position of the card to be placed is empty and the adjacent rules are met, judge whether the coordinates exceed the 3*5 chessboard range.

      参数:
      x - The abscissa of the card to be placed
      y - The ordinate of the card to be placed
      返回:
      If the coordinates are legal, then return true, else false

    • isLegalPlay

      public boolean isLegalPlay​(int x, int y, java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Carte>> co)
      This method determines whether the position of the card to be placed is legal or not When given the chessboard co.
      参数:
      x - The abscissa of the card to be placed
      y - The ordinate of the card to be placed
      co - The chessboard when judging whether the placed card position is legal
      返回:
      If the coordinates are legal, then return true, else false

    • isLegalMove

      public boolean isLegalMove​(int x, int y, int a, int b)
      This method determines whether the step moving card is legal.

      This method first creates a new chessboard to assume that the cards are moved as required.

      And then, set the initial position of the card to be moved to null.

      And then, determine whether the location to be moved is legal.

      参数:
      x - The initial abscissa of the card to be moved
      y - The initial ordinate of the card to be moved
      a - The abscissa of the position to move to
      b - The ordinate of the position to move to
      返回:
      If the step moving card is legal, returns true, otherwise false

    • replaceCarte

      public void replaceCarte​(int x, int y, int a, int b)
      This method places the original card at (x, y) at the position (a, b) and delete the card at position (x,y).
      参数:
      x - The initial abscissa of the card being moved
      y - The initial ordinate of the card being moved
      a - Abscissa after moving
      b - Ordinate after moving

    • coinHautGauche

      public int[] coinHautGauche()
      This method is used to determine the coordinates of the upper-left card on the board.

      This method is used to calculate the score.

      返回:
      the array which contains the coordinates of the upper-left card on the board

    • tapisLength

      public int tapisLength()
      This method is used to determine whether the length of the board is 5 or 3.

      This method is used to calculate the score.

      返回:
      the length of the board

    • calculerScore

      public int calculerScore​(Joueur joueur)
      This method is used to calculate the player's score.

      This method first creates the collection ArrayList of each column.

      This method is divided into two cases, one has a board with a length of 5 and the other with a length of 3. The scores are calculated separately.

      Add the shape, color and fill scores of each row and each column to get the final total score.

      参数:
      joueur - Player to calculate score
      返回:
      The total score of the player

    • calculer

      public int calculer​(java.util.ArrayList<Carte> list, Shape s)
      This method is used to calculate the score.

      This method determines the shape score of each row or column.

      参数:
      list - The row or column of the board to be calculated
      s - The shape of the victory card to be calculated
      返回:
      Returns the score for the shape of the row or column

    • calculer

      public int calculer​(java.util.ArrayList<Carte> list, Fill f)
      This method is used to calculate the score.

      This method determines the fill score of each row or column.

      参数:
      list - The row or column of the board to be calculated
      f - The fill of the victory card to be calculated
      返回:
      Returns the score for the fill of the row or column

    • calculer

      public int calculer​(java.util.ArrayList<Carte> list, Color color)
      This method is used to calculate the score.

      This method determines the color score of each row or column.

      参数:
      list - The row or column of the board to be calculated
      color - The color of the victory card to be calculated
      返回:
      Returns the score for the color of the row or column

    • refresh

      public void refresh()
      This method is used in the graphical interface to refresh the board.

      This method forces the card placed by the player to move to the corresponding position on the board with 1, 1 as the upper left corner.

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      This method defines the method of outputting the chessboard.
      覆盖:
      toString 在类中 java.lang.Object

    • visit

      public void visit​(RegleClassicForTwo regleclassicfortwo)
      This class is the visitor. This method is used to make RectangleTapisVisitor visit (@code RegleClassicForTwo}.

      Used to tell the player to calculate the score of the RegleClassicForTwo mode under the rectangular board.

      指定者:
      visit 在接口中 Visitor
      参数:
      regleclassicfortwo - Game mode to visit
